TopicTitle: KW Rocketry v2.6D Petal Adapter Issue

Articles.Content: So I built myself a Saturn V type style rocket, the rocket worked perfectly until I attempted to put the lander into the mix. When I place the lander where it should go, a decoupler appears that covers the engine of the CSM. The older versions never had this issue, I was wondering if anyone else had this problem and maybe found a way to fix it.
Was able to fix the issue. Had to replace the AutoShroudConfig files with the other files that came with the mod itself. Simple fix.
